by.tc.auction.dao.auction_operation

Interface AuctionOperationDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuctionOperationDAOImpl

    public interface AuctionOperationDAO
    An interface of operations with auctions. An interface which provides methods for working with auctions in an application source.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createAuctionWithLot

        boolean createAuctionWithLot(Auction auction,
                             Lot lot)
                      throws DAOException
        Creates an auction with a lot.
        Parameters:
        auction - - an auction which will be created.
        lot - - a lot which will be created and used in auction.
        Returns:
        true - if an auction and a lot have been created. false - if an auction and a lot haven't been created.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • createAuctionWithExistingLot

        boolean createAuctionWithExistingLot(Auction auction,
                                     java.lang.Integer lotId)
                              throws DAOException
        Creates an auction with an existing lot.
        Parameters:
        auction - - an auction which will be created.
        lotId - - an ID of an existing lot.
        Returns:
        true - if an auction has been created. false - if an auction hasn't been created.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getAuctionInfo

        Auction getAuctionInfo(java.lang.Integer auctionId)
                throws DAOException
        Returns info of an auction.
        Parameters:
        auctionId - - an ID of an auction.
        Returns:
        Auction - if an auction is exist. null - if an auction doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getAuctions

        java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getAuctions(Locale locale)
                                  throws DAOException
        Returns a list of auctions.
        Parameters:
        locale - - a locale of auctions.
        Returns:
        Auctions list of auctions if auctions exist. Empty list if auctions don't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getAuctionsBySearching

        java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getAuctionsBySearching(java.lang.String searchLine,
                                                    Locale locale)
                                             throws DAOException
        Returns a list of auctions by matching a name of a lot.
        Parameters:
        searchLine - - a search line which will be matched with a lot name.
        locale - - a locale of auctions.
        Returns:
        Auctions list of auctions if such auctions exist. Empty list if such auctions don't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • getAuctionsByLotType

        java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getAuctionsByLotType(LotType lotType,
                                                  Locale locale)
                                           throws DAOException
        Returns a list of auctions by searching by the type of a lot.
        Parameters:
        lotType - - a type of lot.
        locale - - a locale of auctions.
        Returns:
        Auctions list of auctions if such auctions exist. Empty list if such auctions don't exist.
        Throws:
        DAOException - - if an error occurred during operation.
